de.awi.floenavigation.synchronization

Class BaseStationSync

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.awi.floenavigation.synchronization.BaseStationSync

  • public class BaseStationSync
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for handling synchronization of base station tables in database. Operations done are reading database tables, pushing the data to the server and parsing the data received from the server

    • Method Detail

      • onClickBaseStationReadButton

        public void onClickBaseStationReadButton()
        Function is used to read base station table from internal db It is called from SyncActivity.java file
        Throws:
        android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException - In case of error in reading database
        See Also:
        baseStationCursor, baseStationName, mmsiData, isOriginData

      • onClickBaseStationSyncButton

        public void onClickBaseStationSyncButton()
        Function is used to push data from internal database to the server A Stringrequest request for pushing the data is registered and added to the requestQueue. callback function Response.Listener#onResponse(Object) notifies whether the request was successful or not If it is unsuccessful or the connection is not established Response.Listener#error(VolleyError) gets called

      • onClickBaseStationPullButton

        public void onClickBaseStationPullButton()
        Function is used to pull data from internal database to the server A Stringrequest request for pulling the data is registered and added to the requestQueue. callback function Response.Listener#onResponse(Object) notifies whether the request was successful or not If it is unsuccessful or the connection is not established Response.Listener#error(VolleyError) gets called On pulling the data from the server internal database tables DatabaseHelper.baseStationTable and DatabaseHelper.baseStationDeletedTable are cleared.

        The server sends the data in .xml format, therefore it has to extract the data based on the tags Inside Response.Listener#onResponse(Object) it loops through the entire xml file till it reaches end of document. Based on the XmlPullParser.START_TAG, XmlPullParser.TEXT, XmlPullParser.END_TAG it adds the values received to the corresponding BaseStation.setStationName(String), BaseStation.setMmsi(int), BaseStation.setOrigin(int) Each baseStationList is added to the baseStationArrayList which is individually taken and added to the internal database.

      • setBaseUrl

        public void setBaseUrl(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                       java.lang.String port)
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - Server URL configured by the admin
        port - Port number configured by the admin
        See Also:
        ParameterViewActivity

      • getDataCompleted

        public boolean getDataCompleted()
        Returns:
        It returns the flag to check whether the data pull from server is completed or not If completed dataPullCompleted returns true.

      • sendBSDeleteRequest

        private void sendBSDeleteRequest()
        After the post request is send to the server, this function is called to send DatabaseHelper.baseStationDeletedTable to the server. Initially the data is extracted from the internal database and then post request is send to the server. A Stringrequest request for pushing the data is registered and added to the requestQueue. callback function Response.Listener#onResponse(Object) notifies whether the request was successful or not If it is unsuccessful or the connection is not established Response.Listener#error(VolleyError) gets called
